content.rendered:
Directed by Vaibhav Misra.

Written by Abbas Dalal. Hussain Dalal. Vaibhav Misra. Harish Dinkar. Pankaj Matta.

Cast Girish Taurani(Gaurav). Navneet Kaur Dhillon(Pooja). Tisca Chopra(Gaurav’s eldest sister). Naveen Kasturia(Kunal). Sachin Khedekar(Pooja’s Father). Benaf Dadachandji(Gaurav’s elder sister (as Benaf Dadachanji)). Yash Pandit(Vinayak Sen Gupta) . Kishore Bhatt(Wedding Guest). Farida Dadi(Pooja’s Grandmom). Harish Dinkar(Dhaba Cook). Mez Galaria(Dancer). Sandeep Garcha(Wedding Guest). Sandeep Hemnaoni(IT Officer Mathur (as Sundip Ved)). Sharif Islam(Wedding Guest). Alex Jaep(Wedding Guest). Vaunisha Kapoor(Wedding Guest). Phelim Kelly(Newspaper Reader). Mervi Koski(Dancer / Club Customer). Ciara A. Lyons(Club Girl). Bradley Wj Miller(Cafe Manager Andrew). Puja Panchkoty(Vandana). Sachin Parikh(Gaurav’s Brother In Law). Savant Singh Premi(Aashish- Gaurav’s Childhood Friend). Zaq Qureshi(Rana Singh). Rafi Raja(Wedding Guest). Nafee Sah(Wedding Guest). Sanjana G. Sandhu(Wedding Guest). Meenakshi Sethi(Pooja’s Mother). Atul Sharma(Uncle). Deviyyani Sharma(Neha- Pooja’s cousin). Sanjeet Sharma(Wedding Guest). Kiran Thapar(Geeta- Pooja’s Friend). Anton Thompson(Bouncer). Cedric Tylleman(Gaurav’s Stag Friend). Vic Waghorn(Wedding Guest). Jade Wijaya(Dancer). Mark Ryder(Airport Traveller (uncredited))

Language Hindi.

Producers Pratik Galani. Vijay Galani. Sudipto Sarkar. Sushanto Sarkar. Sunil Sharma. Yogiraj Shetty.

Production Galani Entertainments. Mars Films Network.
